website_summaries.verdict: If you want a costume wig that looks realistic, consider this gorgeous, high-quality piece
pros: Lace front construction gives a natural-looking parting
Two-tone effect with dark roots fading into an attractive teal
Hair is soft, shiny, and can be heat-styled to suit whatever character you're dressing up as
cons: Some users report it tangles easily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful great quality wig !!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is very pretty and low maintance because of its legnth . I ordered the TQ Blue color abd its definitely an eye catcher . After I recorded this video , I plucked the middle part a little more and it looked way better ! This wig is pretty and you wont be disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Safiya

customer_reviews.title: dont think i did too bad lol. The ends def got thick & matted ...
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this wig. This is my 1st time trying to customize a lace front wig, dont think i did too bad lol. The ends def got thick & matted after a week of wear, only downfall. But i got a ton of compliments 🤗 IG @msbrehaut
customer_reviews.author: Davina

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money :(
customer_reviews.text: I understand the wig is inexpensive; however, a track and the comb should not be hanging after two days of normal wear. I've only worn it a total of 10 hours and it's falling apart. It's cute but I could've saved my $45! Two stars only because if I didn't have these issues, it would be 5 stars. Picture added from first day worn.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig I read it was not for everyday wear , but I wore the mess out of this wig for months! It’s big head feiendly and full face friendly. I washed it a billion times and it washed well. Adding a few photos from when it was new to very old with everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: BarbieGirl28

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wig! And I must say, I love it! I was skeptical and nervous for how it would be received especially since I’ve never worn a wig to work or out and about before. But I’ve gotten a lot of compliments and love it so far. Pros: - Basically ready to wear right out of the package (just cut the lace) - Lays pretty flat Cons: - Light shedding - Cut is a little uneven (but I can easily straighten it out myself)
customer_reviews.author: Ogechi

customer_reviews.title: ... write reviews but I want people to know how amazing this wig is
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews but I want people to know how amazing this wig is! I loveeee it! Arrived on time and fit perfectly. The best synthetic lace wig every. So happy I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made wig
customer_reviews.text: Lace is perfect on this wig. I purchased color 1b and will be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: VeryCherry

customer_reviews.title: Great cut make sure you pluck and conceal your lace with your favorite concealer or fondation ladies 💪
customer_reviews.text: I liked how the unit was cut to perfection.wish the part was a little wider so i wouldn't have to pluck and i wish the wig cap was a little bigger. but other than that its really good to be synthetic hair
customer_reviews.author: TATIANA

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair❤❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair❤❤❤❤. I own 4 and all you need is a good flat iron and the hair is like new. I been wearing this wig for 3 months and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Lopez

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this wig. I saw a blogger review this wig and it looked so natural that I couldn't help but buy one myself for the cheap price. Let me tell you...The color doesn't have that synthetic shine, even on the black roots it looks like my own hair! I wore it out and got many compliments. The style is great but I wish the cut would be a little less blunt. I might take her to the salon to thin the ends and add a bit of layers so it looks a lot more natural! Nevertheless with proper styling or not at all, this wig is amazing and you should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS UNIT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS UNIT!!! YOU DON'T HAVE TO DO MUCH TO THIS WIG. I ACTUALLY WORE THIS IN VALENTINES DAY WITHOUT DOING ANYTHING BUT CUTING THE LACE.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA LEDERER

customer_reviews.title: This wig is EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this wig! I wore it for a holiday occasion and accidentally ended up sleeping in it twice in a row. (Obviously a big No-No!) The wig stiffened and sat in a closet for a few months turned inside out. On a whim, I took it out yesterday and gently washed it through warm shampoo water in a basin. I dried it on cool to set the shape and ran a flat iron through. IT HAS RISEN!! I was so happy to revive this wig to its original sleek and shine with all the bounce!
customer_reviews.author: Charlee Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Love the finished product 😍😍😍 if your debating on buying
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOOVE this wig! It’s a must have! At first I had trouble having it fit my big head but eventually got the hang of it and styled it too me! Love the finished product 😍😍😍 if your debating on buying, just go for it! It’s def worth it!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Slay Yara Wig
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this purchase if I bought me where it was for a costume. This was my first lace front and I love it it’s so natural looking. Ive received multiple compliments on it and no one seems to realize its not my natural hair. Wasnt hard to install thanks to youtube and very affordable. I want another in a different color. The other cool thing is that although it’s synthetic you can use a flat iron!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kelz

customer_reviews.title: Fake & noticeably worn out the package!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was just delivered to me & I took it out the package and it was noticeably worn...the edges are bumped, it’s stiff, the lace is cut with concealer applied to the part...does not even look like a Yara wig A video will be accompanying this review...
customer_reviews.author: xJaix

customer_reviews.title: The Worst....
customer_reviews.text: The wig looks nice to look at and when you put it on, BUT the hair gets tangled a lot and I can’t wear the wig without bringing a brush. The couple of times I wore the wig I always end up putting it into a ponytail. I bought this wig just from the YouTube videos and then I read the reviews on Amazon. I am very dissatisfied and feel like I wasted my money. I own several wigs and this is by far the worst one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT😍😙
customer_reviews.text: 🤗🤗🤗I absolutely Love this hair. Omg it was worth every penny. I didnt rock it with the part down the middle obviously but I like it up😍😍😍🤗🤗
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: ... wig on at my local beauty supply store and loved it but didn't love the price
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this wig on at my local beauty supply store and loved it but didn't love the price. Therefore, I search online and amazon prime had it and shipped out within 2days. I got the bluish green color and it was perfect not to loud but I will definitely order again and play around with some different colors. Yes I got so many compliments and looks 😎. IG: Cortakey_qt follow most of my pics I have wigs on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I will post pictures soon but it is really cute. I actually ended up cutting the longer part of in the front (the short to long cut didn’t look good on me as I hoped it would). It takes heat WELL, like I had it cranked up and it’s STILL smooth. It’s synthetic so expect to get a little tangling when taking it out the packaging. If you have a flat iron I suggest flat ironing and then spray some Pump It Up! Spritz and it’ll last. Oh and get a wig head instead of putting it in that plastic bag!
customer_reviews.author: A'Myah R.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Great Color, Lace Front Wig
customer_reviews.text: This is the only video i have but in the beginning im modeling the Bobbi Boss Bob. Soft Texture Natural look Great price, retail is $50 to $60 in some stores. Lace front Wig (had to cut the lace) About shoulder length Can have the part moved to the side for an asymetric bob, but pre-made part. It is available in several colors but i love the bold colors. Tangles a little but when washed and brushed, it will stay in good condition. So many compliments on the color and cut of this wig. More videos on my amazon wigs and product testing other items, IG BlasianBluuBeauty
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the summer
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous. I don't know what else to say... got the 1b but considering other colors. Fits my large plus head well and easily maintained. A woman on YouTube recommends using a steamer to renew the ends of the wig. Great to know as I plan to put this piece in heavy rotation for as long as it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: justkiley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Really good unit. Minimal shedding and no plucking needed for the center part. I have received many compliments on this look.
customer_reviews.author: msturner88

customer_reviews.title: Good wig
customer_reviews.text: This wig is all shades of beauty... I am sooo in love with this unit! Will definitely get another color. Got loads of complements with this look and trust me that’s the goal.
customer_reviews.author: Nasa

customer_reviews.title: Not correct color or color is off.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely wig but I don't know if I was sent the wrong color or what. It looks SORT OF purple but nothing like the color shown in the pic. It looks more dark greyish brown. Idk. I don't get it. I would have loved to give it a higher rating but the color is all wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: SHOPPER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! HORRIBLE! DO NOT ORDER THIS WIG! This is the most horrible wig and is not Bobbi Boss. It appeared to be a long wig, very shiny, terrible ends, jacked up cut.... There's no redeeming! I should've sent it back.... But I try to let my daughter see what can we do to save it. It's HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: Lovell Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wig for Hot Climates
customer_reviews.text: I love the length of the wig! I’m a native of Phx Az and It gets HOT here. I love that the wig barely hits my neck; keeps me cool. Only con I have with the wig is that it’s really stringy and very shiny. But with time I’m sure it will become more natural looking. My hair is natural and this is a great protective wig and easy maintenance. I ordered the 1B. Rcvd so many compliments and ordered 2 more for some girlfriends of mine!
customer_reviews.author: @weaveshackboss

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Wore this wig ALOT!! Lol lasted me about 3 months and I wore it on and off first pick is it’s original length 2nd pic is after having for about 2months when the ends would get alittle puffy I would just cut them and even the bob out always got compliments wearing it and honestly it never really got extremely puffy at all definatly will but again I made my own baby hair and I plucked the part and added concealer for more natural look....I suggest u do the same if you want your wig to look more natural
customer_reviews.author: Cearia webber

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TO GREAT ❤️
customer_reviews.text: The part is good , could use come bleaching and concealer though, hair is beautiful and looks real, a little too straight for my liking though but can be fixed to your preferred liking , the hairline is super straight when you first get it so it needs plucking also, so overal straight out of the package it’s a very good wig, but with some tweaking it’s a great one !!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Best synthetic wig ever
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this wig the moment I put it on my head! For it to be synthetic, the hair moves and feels just like human hair! Does it shed? Yes, somewhat but it’s synthetic so that’s expected. The only customization I did was plucking A FEW strands in the parting area and adding a bit of concealer and mascara to match my skin tone. My friends jaw dropped completely when she saw me adjust my wig, she thought it was a sew in! I WILL definitely be ordering this wig again....and AGAIN! Oh, and the cut? FLAWLESS.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Summers

customer_reviews.title: Wig cap too small
customer_reviews.text: If you have a large head this wig is not for you. Also if you have a lot of thick hair you have to make sure that you braid your hair down really good in order to try to get the wig on your head. The cap that the wig is made with is super small. I struggled to get this wig on my head. But it is a cute wig
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: Good wig but got a defective piece
customer_reviews.text: The wig is great, hair is soft, color is beautiful but it seems I got a defective lace piece. The lace has bigger holes that are visible and right ear flap with lace is uneven. It looks like it was pulled while packaging maybe that’s why the lace is not even. Not sure how to contact the seller via amazon to get a replacement and I cannot return it since I cut the lace.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: So first of all, I ordered this wig in the ombré turquoise style, and it showed up as a plain black wig. Other than it being the wrong product, the hair is really coarse and the hairline looks too dark. The style of the wig is also pretty awkward and falls into your face so I had to trim it. Overall, not a great experience. If you want to see any more of my makeup looks my Instagram is @gianna_cat_
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Catanzarite

customer_reviews.title: Sexy bob cut 💜
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the wrong color in this wig, but ended up falling inlove with it instantly. The ombré was impressive and the bob cut was really blunt but very cute. Got a lot of compliments with this wig and recommended it to several. Great pricing for it too... in the beauty supply store you’ll find it to be about $50. The part is narrow so I advise some plucking ; there is no other thing I’d do to this wig except baby hairs if preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Shyane Young

customer_reviews.title: Very Sexy Look
customer_reviews.text: I wanted sleek jet black hair for my 43rd bday event & Yara did the job!!! Lots of compliments. Only thing is Yara sheds a lot! Also a little tangled on first day. This isn't a long term look ... I estimate it'll last a week with good maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Ghana Jewelz

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Buy Again but It’s Cute
customer_reviews.text: Man. Let me tell you all something. This wig is gorgeous. However, it is NOT big head friendly. I couldn’t even get the wig to come any further than the middle of the top of my head. I had to throw the wig away. I even adjusted the straps and it still didn’t fit. It gets four stars because it’s nice but I can’t wear it. This wig is probably only big enough for a child to wear. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Joshlyn

customer_reviews.title: I looove this wig!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first wig that I’ve ever purchased and I absolutely love it! The wig is very comfortable and sleek. The color is also very beautiful! Also, there’s no need to pluck the lace closure parting however you will need concealer to cover the knots in the part. The wig is synthetic but can be flat ironed on low heat. I flat ironed mine on 365 degrees to keep the ends straight and sleek . In all it was worth purchasing and I will be purchasing another color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: nothing like photo
customer_reviews.text: this wig is horrible. once on, it looks nothing like how it does in the stock photo. does not look realistic at all. there are also these weird, super short choppy layers in the bottom back. very disappointed in this wig. if you are looking for a wig that looks realistic like in the stock photo, this is NOT the wig for you.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Arthurs

customer_reviews.title: Poppin’ Bob
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast with Prime of course . The wig is absolutely gorgeous and everything I wanted for a hairstyle ! I get lots of compliments . My favorite thing about the wig is the middle part and that it looks natural . The reason for four stars is because it got stiff at the ends after a day or so of wearing it . I’d recommend for every other day wear . ✨
customer_reviews.author: Zappora

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I like this wig for the most part. It came really fast, the same day I needed it for an event which is what I was hoping for. Bobbi Boss wigs are usually really good. I do see the tangling thing happening that people mention. I think it could be fixed by dipping it in boiling water everytime you wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wig because i love color and the cut is banging but I didn’t expect it to be this fabulous it is exactly as pictures and so flowy i cant wait to wear it to the xscape concert tomorrow night 5 stars don’t hesitate ladies buy this wig you will love it just as much as i do
customer_reviews.author: Dalenea  adams

customer_reviews.title: Great wig !!
customer_reviews.text: Great wig for the price, the hair is very soft and manageable, doesn’t shed or anything. I love the bright teal blue color. The ombré two tone and teal is blended very well. The con is the part is not like pictured, you will have to pluck the part and thin out the front a little for it to look natural and lay flat like I did ..
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: This wig is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: This wig is beautiful in person, I can iron it and style it however I want. This is the best wig on the market. No one could tell it was a wig. GREAT product
customer_reviews.author: DPad

customer_reviews.title: I loved this wig
customer_reviews.text: I loved this wig. I had bought soft black but it wasn't for me to I returned it and ordered dark brown. When i received the dark brown wig it was basically the soft black. I paid 3 extra dollars to get the same color as before. I was so excited that I just trimmed the lace and decide to keep it and dye my hair and brows instead. It does shed a little and the lace is a tad bit too tight on my head but it's still a nice wig
customer_reviews.author: jami

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig! I wore it for like a month straight. Some of the tracks came loose and the ends get a little straggly after wearing it every day for a month. I didn't glue it down or anything because I like the freedom of taking it off at night. But overall Its very sturdy and still looks good. I will be reordering soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wig in love with it I am going to order in other colors👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best synthetic wig purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hair is the bomb!!! Cheap way to try different colors and styles . Low maintenance hair I just bumped the ends and go. Love love love so far it’s been 3 days no tangles/shedding. Almost hard to believe it synthetic hair. I will be buying more. Too many compliments
customer_reviews.author: sj88

customer_reviews.title: Bomb ass wig
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 of these wigs. It's one of my favorite wigs to wear.
customer_reviews.author: dee arm

customer_reviews.title: It’s gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: After watching so me reviews on YouTube; I finally bought this wig. Color 1B. First thought when I put it on “yasssss oweeee ima baddie”. I had lots of compliments. People be suprised when I tell them it’s synthetic. It feels nice. Butttttttt let’s see how long it will last lol. I usually wear bundles but if you need a quick temporary style, this is the look to go towards. SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: sharde

customer_reviews.title: Good for a short time
customer_reviews.text: This bob lasted me a good month/ month and a half. I only bought it because I wanted to see if i would look right with a bob before I went and bought some expensive bundles. I don't regret buying this at all because I looked really nice for that first month. Once it started getting stiff though I had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Annia A.

customer_reviews.title: The Turquoise is Black/midnight Blue Don't BOTHER
customer_reviews.text: I order the turquoise wig and although it's turquoise on the picture online and even on the tag, the wig itself is black with a few strands of dark midnight blue. There's nothing remotely real about this. Sending it back. Sad that I wasted my time
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday look!
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of reviews before i purchased this! i was very skeptical but i'm glad i took the risk. If you're on the fence, buy it! I wore it several times before i finally had to "retire" her. she lasted through a week in new orleans! I absolutely love the color (i got blue) and the ease of wearing it. I plan to purchase another color for my upcoming girls trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wig but matted too soon
customer_reviews.text: The wig is gorgeous and I received tons of compliments. I purchased for a trip to Vegas and unfortunately the wig matted up by the second day of the trip. It wasn’t horribly matted which may work for some but I personally don’t like how wigs look even when slightly matted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking about buying this wig, but are hesitant, just please do it for yourself. Its soft. The lace is a great color. It has a nice cap on the inside. It looks so natural. I love it and will prob buy more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Schuller

customer_reviews.title: Quality the doesn’t cost an arm and a leg!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this unit many times ( in a different color) from a well known retailer so when I say the quality is exactly how it should be trust me! The price was great as well. I didn’t have any problems with shipping and the vendor emailed me to make sure I was satisfied. I’ll definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Elle Nyc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quick style 💕
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I wanted to see how the long bob look would suit me for work I Love this product for a quick in between style and it’s pretty good as long as you are gentle with the hair and how you wear it. I’ve been wearing it for almost 3 weeks now just about every other day and I feel like it has great potential but to keep the ends especially in the front crisp you have to trim and run a flat iron on low temperature to maintain the style a bit. Otherwise great value for the price💕
customer_reviews.author: Glow Beauté

customer_reviews.title: Everything you've read or seen about this wig is true ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything you've read or seen about this wig is true! A must have synthetic wig for your collection. After moderate wear, the ends do get a bit rough, but a simple pass through the straightener will help tremendously.This wig will last you a month or two depending on how often you wear it. I think I will wear this for special occasions when I'm trying to put a "look" together, and in that case it should last me many many months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: So sexy and sleek I love love love this wig!!Even when I gets old you can just run through it with a flat iron after watching it in some conditioner... Good as new :-)
customer_reviews.author: Milliep

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller, Price, and Product
customer_reviews.text: This wig is beautiful. It is well made, lays flat, and moves beautifully. I dyed the MLF136 color using synthetic fabric dye and turned it into a silvery pinkish lavender color. I also cut the angled bob to look like a blunt cut even all the way around bob. I got Soooo many compliments on this hair. Arrived super fast too.
customer_reviews.author: nadine dungy

customer_reviews.title: Dont think...just buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Yaaaaaasssssssss!!! Perfect. Sexy and sassy. The hair feels so nice. Parting is perfect. I need this in human hair next. Im sure this wig would look good on anybody thats how well its made and how nice it is. Get it while you can because the price is going up and this is the best price I have found online.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Omg I felt so much love in this wig the texture is awesome I purchase many of wigs from beauty supply and amazon synthetic and this wig feels human , haven’t experienced shedding yet has a bounce to it and it’s flat unlike them other wigs on the part that’s bulky I love it
customer_reviews.author: Newky Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great wig!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig, and it’s a great lace front for the price. It doesn’t shed and it’s easy to brush. The only thing I don’t love is that the knots aren’t bleached, and the hair does look fake (in my opinion). But for the cost, it was worth it! It’s very sleek and has a bold cut, which looks super cute! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I wore this wig to the opening of Star Wars Galaxy's Edge &recieved so many compliments because it looked so real! I am not a middle part kind of girl, so I pulled it over as a side part and trimmed the ends looked so they looked even. It came out amazing and I wish my hair really looked like this lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great wig, but big heads beware.
customer_reviews.text: Love the wig! The color is amazing (dark green) and the density and cut is great. I’m also in love with the parting space. It’s long and good width which helps it look realistic. Front hairline could use some plucking. Only complaint I have is that it is definitely a “tiny head” wig. Super snug fit. I thought I had an average size head and this is like a centimeter from being too small to wear. Overall very happy though and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: MoonDame

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wig. Best Synthetic Wig I’ve Tried.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, it exceeded all my expectations. The feel and bounce it has is remarkable.Easy to install and it’s a wear and go. It is synthetic hair so a bit of shedding and loss of movement will occur. But it is worth what the cost is and more.
customer_reviews.author: Livz

customer_reviews.title: It does have a little shedding at the beginning but besides that is wonderful. Some people don’t even notice it’s a wig
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I hope for. It does have a little shedding at the beginning but besides that is wonderful. Some people don’t even notice it’s a wig.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Cap is really small. They should label the cap sizing
customer_reviews.author: ns01

customer_reviews.title: Buggy Hair...Literally.
customer_reviews.text: The wig is cute. You can't make a new part, and it's a little sparse in the back but nothing crazy. My issue is it seems like I may have gotten a previously returned one. The wig was already out of it's packaging and one of the straps was broken inside. Also some kind of tiny jumpy bug jumped out of the hair when I was taking it out of the packaging. I didn't get a good look, but that's what really worries me the most. I'm not looking to get fleas from a wig. We'll see what happens I guess, but the unit is definitely being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Gem H

customer_reviews.title: The cut is a bit choppy and the hair is overall pretty shiny in the roots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the purple color and it is gorgeous. Fits my head quite tight on the loosest band. The cut is a bit choppy and the hair is overall pretty shiny in the roots. Also would prefer a bit more lace in the lace front, it's only the part and a small bit, maybe quarter of an inch around the front cap.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clevinger

customer_reviews.title: Save the extra money and get a real human hair wig
customer_reviews.text: Dont believe the hype very plasticky very wiggy very synthetic it just doesnt look real dont let the filtered review pics fool you
customer_reviews.author: tercel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but...
customer_reviews.text: I think for be price, you get a good quality wig. My issue is that the back of the wig has an odd shape. Kinda slopes down. I’ve tried stuffing my wig cap so the hair shape looks more normal when on my head but I think the part doesn’t extend long enough towards the back of the head.
customer_reviews.author: 8bitMeow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig....fits snug....the parting is great and the cut is so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wig. I have been searching for a wig that has such natural parting and that fits well,doesn't slide to the back of my head like others in the past have. Hair quality is good.barley had to add any make up to the part. I love it. It is an everyday wig for sure. Going to buy another one in a different color soon. So happy. Came quickly too. BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: So classy and if properly installed looks VERY natural!
customer_reviews.text: Love it 😍 I haven’t installed it yet but I’m super excited!! I’m wearing the blonde one right now and if you know how to really style it, it will look natural asf like u just came from the beauty chair okurrrrrr 👏🏾
customer_reviews.author: Darika

customer_reviews.title: Con artist
customer_reviews.text: You’re better off buying this from samsbeauty because this unit is defected. I ordered on Sep 26, 2019, tried it on once, didn’t wear it outside, then tried it on again about three days later and the tangling was horrible, one side was puffy and wouldn’t go away with washing or applying heat. Oh and prepare for a bumpy ass wig out of the pack. This is not sold by Bobbi Boss, I know that brand well. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: MsWriter23

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo nice. Lots of compliments. We shall see how it holds up. Tangled a bit by end of day. But nothing dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: KAY

customer_reviews.title: I love this wig!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wig! It is gorgeous for the price. Decent quality and minimal tangling in comparison to some of my other synthetic wigs. It does require a good deal of plucking around the hairline, but that's usally the case for the price range. I purchased the 2-natural hair color, blonde ombre, and recently the blue ombre since I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Tanesha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig.! Received so many compliments on a daily. Very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Shnae

customer_reviews.title: Great looking item
customer_reviews.text: This item is so beautiful a lot of people have given me compliments. The hair is soft and has a great flow. Will buy others from this company. You will love it as well....Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Belinda young

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. I cut into a blunt Bob, after a year of owning
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wig for a year. Lol. I figure now is a good time to review! This wig is great for the price. The knots ok no the lace are pretty chunky, that's my only qualm with the wig. I wore the original style for a year. I cut it into a blunt Bob today. I dyed the ends green using idye poly in the colors green and yellow. I straightened it with a steamer. I highly recommend if you're on the fence!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor and Sean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: At first was hesitant about it but once I got to work with it felt comfortable and loved the looks it gave me. First time I ever purchased hair from Amazon, will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: definitely must
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wig for halloween but it honestly was a really good wig so I wore it in the office. I got a lot of compliments, so now I may purchase another as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: It's very beautiful and I got a lot of compliments. It sheds a lot when you brush it so I don't recommend it for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: A.Horton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wig!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this wig and plan on ordering a few more. I've got nothing but compliments and I've had to tie the hair back for work and theres no kink from.the hairtie or anything when I take it down. Color is great👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Cute wig but the hair starts to feel and look like do
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this unit a 5 but after 4' days of wearing this unit the ends of the wig got so frizzy and thick I had to flatiron it and that barely worked.... overall it's and ok wig I guess... I did love the color on me though
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: I rocked this wig 🔥🔥🔥 it’s fire.
customer_reviews.text: This lace front is everything and then some. It does not tangle or shed. I am a Bobbi Boss fan. Need to get in every color. The color is amazing. Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia's Shoe Closet

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy this wig. Its very sleek. It does become stiff after some time so make sure you give it TLC. Nothing a deep wash can’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Hope

customer_reviews.title: The unit was packaged very nicely and the wig was very silky
customer_reviews.text: This unit came within 2 days of me ordering it. The unit was packaged very nicely and the wig was very silky. I bought this unit accidentally but as soon as I received it, and saw the quality, I didn’t regret it. After 2 weeks of wearing the wig out it became to stiffen up but boiled water and conditioner revived it. I’m pleased with this product. I will buy another one a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on this wig. Hands down my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: A. Romain

customer_reviews.title: First Wig Ever
customer_reviews.text: I went back & forth trying to decide if I wanted to purchase this wig. I’m soooo happy I did. I absolutely love it & it’s easy to wear with this being my first time ever wearing a wig!!
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyy better than I expected. I’m buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is amazing! Great quality and can look realistic not like super synthetic. With a little bit of plucking at the part you’ve got a great wig!!! (: I ordered the blue for fun wear here and there BUT I’m now going to order one in brown to wear more often!!! I LOOVE the cut! It’s a PERFECT cut, especially in the back it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: you won't regret it very nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: A must buy, you won't regret it very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Wig Approved!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wig for beginners/first timers... I.e. - Me!! Very light weight and natural looking. It tangled alittle but but not too bad. Has two combs in front, one in back and adjustable. For perfect! Ordered in a #2!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara B.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the teal. When it arrived I realized I should have ordered the green because i wanted it darker. But this Teal was too pretty to return . So I just kept it and ordered the green and blonde. Real nice wig
customer_reviews.author: M.A.L

customer_reviews.title: She is on point!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wig and fitted well!!! I didn't have to pluck it at all, I just had to cut the lace, add some concealer and foundation powder and i was good to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: shuntera franklin

customer_reviews.title: Small hole In lace part
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this wig, because the reviews were so great, I bought it a couple months ago finally opened it and realized there’s a hole in the lace part. Extremely disappointed, but still is a beautiful wig
customer_reviews.author: Sekayi Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Such a pretty unit! I did have to thin her out ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty unit! I did have to thin her out a bit cause she was too dense for my liking. The lace is soft and easy to trim. Will have to get used to a middle part cause you cannot shift her. But she's perfect just the way she is.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Khieu

customer_reviews.title: Cute style!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this wig first time doing a crazy color ! Got so many compliments only thing bad is the position of the combs wishing it was a free part tooo track started coming loose in back probably won’t buy again plus side this wig look so real not fake .
customer_reviews.author: NICHOLE REYES

customer_reviews.title: Very Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: Hair looks extremely cheap. You do get what you pay for. Hair matted up 1st day. Super shiny. Didn’t make it the whole night before I had to take off and just put a bonet on. Very disappointed with this purchase. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ceciley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig! Not too shiny, super soft, and the color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Go to the beauty supply
customer_reviews.text: It came in the wrong color I wanted blue & was a solid black. The quality is very bad I know the price but let me say I got wigs from the beauty store same price and are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: RayMarie
